Video evidence: CBS News video footage showed Clinton arriving on the tarmac in Bosnia without any visible duress, contradicting her claim of landing under sniper fire.
News stories: A review of over 100 news stories from the time of the Bosnia trip found no documentation of any security threats or sniper fire towards the First Lady.
Eyewitness account: CBS reporter Sharyl Attkisson, who covered Clinton on the Bosnia visit, stated that she did not recall or note any close calls with sniper fire or other dangers during the trip.
Clinton: s retraction: Clinton herself retracted her remarks a week later, admitting that she had "misspoke" and correcting herself to say that she had been told there was a threat of sniper fire in the area.
